title: Open wires, overhead lines, including telephone cables are to be outside 500 meters from unit boundary
clause_text: Open wires, overhead lines, including telephone cables are to be outside 500 meters from unit boundary. However, UG cables. (below 5 meters) are permissible. No rail line with electric traction is permitted within two kilometers from the unit.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
